Class TrophyScoreVisitor

java.lang.Object
visitor.TrophyScoreVisitor
All Implemented Interfaces:
ScoreVisitor
public class TrophyScoreVisitor extends Object implements ScoreVisitor
Visitor for tracking card information relevant to trophy conditions. Tracks highest/lowest cards per suit and Joker presence.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Hazri and Sophea
